title: What are the differences and similarities pre-colonial, Spanish period, and American period? - Quora
tags: History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Where? Florida, Texas, New Mexico, The Philippines, Latin America? Brazil had Porturguese and Dutch periods as well. For the wretched indigenous populations, everywhere went to pot soon after 1492, save only in Paraguay, which had in consequence to endure the near genocidal war of 1865–70 at the hands of Brazil, Argentina, and Uruguay, at the behest of UK interests.
